items.sentence: I live near her house, but I seldom see her.
I lived in Boston for more than three years.
I looked in my closet for something to wear.
I lost my best friend in a traffic accident.
I lost my watch, so I have to buy a new one.
I searched for hours, but couldn\'t find it.
I should\'ve gotten up earlier this morning.
I still don\'t understand how this happened.
When was the last time you kissed your wife?
Where did you find it, at school or at home?
Where do you want me to put these suitcases?
Which do you like better, apples or oranges?
Which do you prefer, white wine or red wine?
Let\'s go for a walk after it stops raining.
What I\'m really interested in is astronomy.
I thought Tom would want to know about that.
I told Tom that he should go to the meeting.
I\'m really looking forward to Tom\'s visit.
It\'s been over a week since I last saw Tom.
It\'s one of the oldest buildings in Boston.
